column3:
“Location: Lightshade on 6th
THC: 16.69%
CBD: Unknown 
THC-A: 10.28%

Additional Notes: I saw this strain at Lightshade on 6th about a month ago while visiting Denver, but wasn't able to try them. The looks and smell were almost identical both visits. 

Appearance Rating: 5.00 Appearance Description: These Burkle are truly beautiful. They're a neon green color with some pieces showing more purple than others. They hav...”

“It is obvious this strain is indica. I smoked some and was very euphoric. After the euphoria passed, I was still very relaxed and in a good mood. I did smoke it and go back inside and was told that I reeked so I would use caution when smoking around people who are easily offended by the smell.”

“Burkle is one of my all time favorite Indicas and I smoke it as often as I can.  A good batch of Burkle should smell a little spicy and sweet at the same time. You should feel your eyelids drop a little when that aroma hits your nose.  A really good strain if you have trouble sleeping like I do.  Usually I sleep throughout the night when I smoke a few bowls in my bong.  Highly recommend for any Indica lover.”

“This was the first indica i've tried and by far my favorite strain i've had. Got an amazing deal from LivWell in Garden city, $99/oz. The smell and flavor are unreal and the effects are fast hitting and long lasting. Great for someone that struggles with insomnia.”

“I love this strain! It makes me completely happy and stress free. Even makes me lay there and just laugh....even when all by myself. That never happens, and I live in Denver and try many many strains.”
“this one is fire. looks good, smells good and smokes better. nice 26% makes sure for a pleasing high. really relieved pain in my lower back after a few bowls. good stuff”
“Picked this up at Lighshade this weekend, and it's some of the best flower I've found in Colorado. Smells great, tastes amazing, and hits hard.”

“My new favorite. Burkle is awesomeness. With pre 98 bubba x grandaddy purple you can't go wrong. Very happy relaxing high that will put your ass to sleep. The smell and taste are amazing and the high is second to none. Very good pain relief as well. It helped my crohn's and back pain immensely. Made me sleep like a baby.”

“My new favorite. Burkle is awesomeness. With pre 98 bubba x grandaddy purple you can't go wrong. Very happy relaxing high that will put your ass to sleep. The smell and taste are amazing and the high is second to none. Very good pain relief as well. It helped my crohn's and back pain immensely. Made me sleep like a baby.”
“everything it's cracked up to be and more”
“Absolute favorite of mine”
“This weed has a really good body high. Would recommend to anyone who has sleep issues as well.”
“its indica”
“Can we add a 6th star?... This is one of the most beautiful indicas I have smoked... The beautiful flavor goes all the way to the end of the J.”
“AMAZING strain. Nice and relaxing buzz with some munchies makes it great before bed. a few more puffs and you'll be out. Definitely reccomend”

“Heavy stuff.  A bowl shared with my babe left me totally relaxed and couchlocked, he was off in the kitchen rummaging for munchies.  Great auditory supplementation, perfect for lazy days listening to music or watching a good movie.  Decent head change accompanies the body high.  Will cause a bit of a headache if you're greedy though!”

“Delicious and potent, I got some burkle in co at 27% one toke did the job and I'm no rookie. 
Definitely worth looking for, driving to and finding. Just make sure you have someone else driving for you afterward;)”
“Great strain, feeling happy, relaxed, a bit uplifted as well. Good for a lazy Sunday. Smells like blueberries with a hint of pepper. Smokes smooth.”
“Wow! Got it in Trinidad, Colorado. Awesome! Turned my brain right off and gave me total body/mind RELAXATION. Thank God for the man who put it in my hoooooood"”"
“sleepy sleep sleep, weird smell”
“This strain a geniune blessing. Such a relaxing body high with an extreme boost of creativty for the mind. Maddness 8773 thanks you lightshades holly location.”
“Super”
“A great smelly, beautiful, and tasty strain, I would definitely suggest it to any smoker, especially if you perfer Indica. Has that great indica on set body high, numbs my pains right away.”

“This is the first time I have ever tried this strain and it gives me a burning sensation in my throat that does not feel like it is associated with THC. The feeling is compared to smoking paper. Granted I could’ve got a bad batch or this may be a knockoff. I mean, I feel it working, it’s just the harsh burn that cones with it. I hoped for a smoother tasted that fit the visual but it is what it is.”

“This right here is very very very good . I bought a gram at my favorite dispensary . For the last 4 days I have been at the mercy of relying on local in my old home state . Came back to the west coast and here we are Burkel . What a great tasting flavor and the buzz is right on point , early wake and bake for me . Love the taste , like a dark berry wine with a bitter sharpness at the end . Instant calming over the he...”

“this smells as sweet as a rose and tastes as sweet as candy! absolutely! a bit of a couch potato maker tho. definately if you wanna chill, and i mean ¢hi11. very relaxing. has to be my favourite. 10/10 would smoke again...and again...and again...”
“I would have never guessed this was indica because it keeps me so awake and focused. The first time I used this strain, I cleaned my entire house. And that says a lot because I'm extremely lazy.”
“One of my favorites.”
“Major case of the couch lock, but after a long day, this is perfect.”

“At first, the smell had me thinking this was Blueberry crossed with Purple Urkel. Leafly set me straight on the lineage, and then a fat blunt of this sweet Burkle set me straight down on the couch. 
I have a pretty high tolerance, and this one really took the edge off. This particular sample was a bit dry and slightly purple with a very dense, Kush-type bud structure.
My next sesh I have to mix this with a Diesel and...”
“Site says not available in Henderson NV, but I justed picked up some @Jenny's”
“I bought this on 9/8/14, and I haven't tried it yet.”
